title: Trundlemere needs to 1-hit KO ALWAYS the ranged champipons
body:
It is time Riot Games ltd. finally adressed the issue with the ranged champoins in League of Legends™. They are really OP and need an effective counter. I porpose that we make tyrndamere (my main - 1000+ games in silver 4) 1 shot always the ranged cha mpions.

Why is this fair? and balanced? because rtyndamere is not range he is melee so if u are not in you're ultimate ability you will die in 2 second to range champion before you get in range to hit them.

Please dear god riot please do this.
